name: Stronger Together (JairRojasB)
description:
I finished Sonic Unleashed (PS3) some days before the jam and I decided to make something slightly inspired by the final boss of that game x'd

Controls:

Move: Arrows/WASD

Move Faster: LShift/RShift

BGM "Onesie" made by Evan King

Keys Sprites were inspired by Hyohnoo

ps: There is a hidden three letter code that will increase your damage to the max
